summary: The Buddhist priest wants the Daughter of the Daimyo to become a priestess at the Forbidden Garden. The Daimyo thinks if he were in Europe that his daughter should decide on her own, but he... See full summary »
cast: Paul Biensfeldt|Lil Dagover|Georg John|Meinhart Maur|Rudolf Lettinger|Erner Huebsch|Käte Küster|Niels Prien|Herta Heden|Loni Nest
title: Harakiri
